title: Did the 49ers make any trades? Explaining San Francisco's trade deadline decisions
description:
The San Francisco 49ers have had a weird season.

Much of the oddity centers around the quarterback decision, where Brock Purdy keeps missing time and Mac Jones keeps starting.

But there have also been plenty of injuries that have kept things interesting.
